Michael Brantley bụ onye America na-ese ihe, nke a maara màkà nnukwu ihe osise mmanụ ya nke ndị Africa America jazz dị ka Ella Fitzgerald na Freddie Hubbard. N'afọ 2015, a chọpụtara na Brantley nwèrè sarcoidosis ma gbochie ya ịnshọransị site na Affordable Care Act. Brantley bụ ónyé otu African American Artists Collective na Kansas City, MO.
